trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around April 30th 1996
divs: sighting details#1.broad daylight, windy,several clouds.spotted large dark object dead still inthe distance.watched for several minutes till cloud blocked.#2,10pm orso,spotted small object moving n,5000ft?about150mph.1\2mile behind isanother.1\2m.behind them is a stealth,light on and audible.objects had nolights,or sound. spotted them by city glow off bottom.#3,spotted identicalobjects moving n,then 2 stealths,jets pulled intercept turns and split up inwhat appeared to be active pursuit.#4,with 3 other witnesses, saw a craft thesize of a city block,lit up with very bright red and white lights,go through themiddle of the n\s albuq.flight path. kirtland had to have seen it, it was huge,about 1000ft up, and moving about 150mph. lower and slower than the comercialtraffic. it was dead silent!!!! we were using my telescopes on the sky, had tostop talking frequently from the jet noise. i spotted the object from about amile away,and noticed i couldnt hear it comming,like the jets.i imediatly gottheir attention, and all 4 of us watched it come straight at us, go directlyoverhead, and pass out of sight. hope this isn,t too long winded.
